title: not all boards show up when im creating a board
body:
like now i wanted to create a board in general discussion and it showed

boards feedback
memes  & games
creations
story,art
bug report
team recruitment
player behaviour 
and support


and not all of my boards show up, some say i need level 7 or above while im ranked and level 30 for 5 months
please help

replies.body:
Often if you haven't used the Boards for a while, your Summoner and Boards profiles will have not synced for a while. This can result in the Boards thinking you're a much lower level than you actually are. Creating a discussion post such as this one will force a resync and it appears this should be resolved.

Let me know if you have any troubles posting on the boards now.
